page.title: 03Football Teams
page.content: There are{2 teams}in{Evenwood}who play in reconised leagues.The first is{ {Evenwood Town Team}who play in{ {Division 2} of the{Dryboroughs {Northern League.}The 2nd is a team from a pub in the village called the{ {White Swan}who play in{The Wear Valley {Sunday Morning League}.Both teams use the same field for their home games, that of{Evenwood Town. {The White Swan}started playing friendly games in 1979.In 1980 they won the friendly league cup final beating{Toft Hill Three Tuns}1-0.In 1981-82 the{Wear Valley Sunday Morning {League}was formed and the{White Swan} won the league and reached the semi final of the league cup.Their best season up to now was that of 1984-85, when they{won}the{league,League Cup} and{five-a-side}tournament.In the league they{played 24}&{won 24}.
